preprocessing_applied.newline_fixes: Converted literal \n to actual newlines, then replaced with special token: <|LINE_SEP|>
preprocessing_applied.line_separation: Used special token '<|LINE_SEP|>' for reliable line boundary detection
preprocessing_applied.unicode_sanitization: Converted problematic Unicode chars to ASCII equivalents
preprocessing_applied.user_prompt_formatting: Combined question + solution into standardized user prompt format

dataset_info.description: Flawed-only line-level error detection dataset with comprehensive preprocessing

column_descriptions.text: Complete user prompt: system instruction + problem + preprocessed solution
column_descriptions.correct_answer: Original GSM8K correct answer for reference
column_descriptions.line_labels: One-hot encoded labels [0,0,1,0,...] indicating error line
